channel.title: Can't Log In!
channel.description:
Hey guys!
Having serious issues with logging into minecraft. I have uninstalled and reinstalled minecraft several times. Force updates..all that craic. But every time i still get the "Cannot connect to minecraft.net" message and the options to retry or play offline.
This is annoying the shit out of me because I have a youtube channel and need to get online to record with my friends. Any advice would be helpful. Thanks in advance!

item.title: Can't Log In!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:4, topic:417798”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=520342.msg3778899#msg3778899 date=1318297492]
Go to:
C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc

Open the file ‘hosts’

Make sure it does not contain minecraft.net inside of it. This is if you are on a windows machine. Otherwise I’m not sure.
[/quote]Why would there be a hosts file entry for minecraft…? If there is he should know about it.[/quote]

Why? Hehe. My brother was addicted to Star Wars Galaxies, so I looked up the addresses it connects to and put them all in the hosts file, pointing to localhost. He couldn’t play it for about a month and a half until he figured it out. He was super-duper-pissed.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Log In!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:417798”]Go to:
C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc

Open the file ‘hosts’

Make sure it does not contain minecraft.net inside of it. This is if you are on a windows machine. Otherwise I’m not sure.[/quote]Why would there be a hosts file entry for minecraft…? If there is he should know about it.

It might be a firewall blocking minecraft, but then again it just uses https so you’d have to be using a super shit firewall for it to block that.

Alternatively, there may be a DNS problem. What happens if you ping minecraft.net from the console?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Log In!
item.dc:creator: @mouldygamer mouldygamer
item.description:
@mouldygamer wrote:

nope, there wasn’t anything in there to do with minecraft. Thanks anyways.

Read full topic
